text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the ASUS ROG Strix Hero III Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Type Full HD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070, Intel Core i7-9750H, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe NVMe SSD, Per-Key RGB KB, Windows 10 Pro, G531GW-XB74 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the ASUS ROG Strix Hero III Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Type Full HD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070, Intel Core i7-9750H, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe NVMe SSD, Per-Key RGB KB, Windows 10 Pro, G531GW-XB74 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix Hero III Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Type Full HD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070, Intel Core i7-9750H, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe NVMe SSD, Per-Key RGB KB, Windows 10 Pro, G531GW-XB74 is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix Hero III Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Type Full HD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070, Intel Core i7-9750H, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe NVMe SSD, Per-Key RGB KB, Windows 10 Pro, G531GW-XB74!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Fortnite. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix Hero III Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Type Full HD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070, Intel Core i7-9750H, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe NVMe SSD, Per-Key RGB KB, Windows 10 Pro, G531GW-XB74 is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
